name: Pickaxe
description:
## Pickaxe

A tool used to mine stone. It is burnt after use.

You can craft a pickaxe at the Blacksmith in the game.

## Supply

Unlimited

### Crafting Costs

---

- 2 Wood
- 1 SFL
